nodes.text: The forty-eighth annual Dragonfire Air Rally was an instance of the Dragonfire Air Rally airspeeder race that took place on Coruscant, sponsored by Daystar Entertainment. During the race, Ramil of Serenno was sabotaged by the crime lord Cenevax so that her gambling ring could earn profits from those who bet on him. After Ramil's airspeeder crashed, Thrar of Coachelle Prime won the race.
